ygData.subject: Re: Wizard Damage
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool!  Necs are supposed to be pretty good... maybe he wasn t letting loose on his spells and underestimated you. -- Lim Dul Message: 1 Date: Mon, 30 Aug 1999
ygData.messageBody:
Cool! Necs are supposed to be pretty good... maybe he wasn't letting loose
on his spells and underestimated you.

-- Lim'Dul

Message: 1
Date: Mon, 30 Aug 1999 11:23:32 -0600
From: "Jason Smith" <jj@...>
Subject: Wizard Damage

>Hail Fellow Wizards!
Just thought all you fellow wizards would like to know about >our
comparison
>to Necromancers. I am a level 35 Wizard and had a Mob camped yesterday. I
>was easily taking it alone and then a 45th Necromancer came by and tried to
>steal my kill. Before I knew his level, and tried to get the kill ebbi
>D'Arcanus 35th E'Ci
